h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Monk from the Sea
content: Now you can head down the main stairs to encounter this new foe, a Clay Vajra. While he may look like a Yaoguai Chief, this is just a very formidable Yaoguai (that thankfully doesn't respawn).
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'New_Thunderclap_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'New Thunderclap Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Monk from the Sea'.
The content is as follows:
Now you can head down the main stairs to encounter this new foe, a Clay Vajra. While he may look like a Yaoguai Chief, this is just a very formidable Yaoguai (that thankfully doesn't respawn).
